rows.label: qev092406_MSG0001
rows.name:
I've been thinking about something
I read in my father's journal...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0002
rows.name: "In my fear of others altruism became my trustiest weapon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0003
rows.name:
"By forcing my kindness upon others
I tried to buy theirs in return.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0004
rows.name:
"What more selfish motive could exist?
Such kindness is but a hollow shell."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0005
rows.name:
As a younger woman, I never understood
what he meant. But now...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0006
rows.name: I see that he and I are the same.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0007
rows.name:
I fear that people I'm unkind to will betray me.
And I'd rather vanish than be betrayed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0008
rows.name:
So what do I do now?
I'd thought that if I read his journal I'd know, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0009
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0010
rows.name:
I'm sorry. I just...
I'm so afraid of other people. Of everyone![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0011
rows.name:
I can't help but think they'll all turn on me
like they did to my father.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0012
rows.name: I mean, what if Ornella was just the first of many?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0013
rows.name:
How do I face Ada and the others
when I can't trust them not to hurt me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_JNK0010
rows.name: Assure

rows.label: qev092406_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Hope that no one else is going to hurt her.

rows.label: qev092406_JNK0020
rows.name: Force

rows.label: qev092406_SEL0021
rows.name: Take Hope by the arm and lead her to Ada.

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0014
rows.name:
I know that in my head,
but the rest of me can't seem to believe it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0015
rows.name: Still, I can't just go hide in a hole, either.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0016
rows.name:
All right. I guess I should try to be brave
and go see Ada, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0017
rows.name: What? N-no! Wait, please! I'm not ready![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0018
rows.name:
Come on, PLEASE let me help!
I owe her more than I can even say.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0019
rows.name: Not as much as me. You sit tight while I go find it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0020
rows.name: She's been helping me out since the day I moved to New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0021
rows.name: Hey, whoa! Really, you guys, this is too many people![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0022
rows.name:
I get how you all feel,
but a search party this big is just chaos.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0023
rows.name: Ah! Welcome back! You find that "thing" yet?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_JNK0030
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev092406_SEL0031
rows.name: Nod and give a thumbs-up.

rows.label: qev092406_JNK0040
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev092406_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Ada if there's a riot starting.

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0024
rows.name: Really? That's awesome![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0025
rows.name:
I called up some people Hope helped,
and then they called MORE people, and...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0026
rows.name: Well, it kind of snowballed. I'm glad I can call this off![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0027
rows.name:
No, I called up some people Hope helped,
and then they called MORE people, and...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0028
rows.name:
Well, it kind of snowballed.
But I assume you already found the journal, yeah?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0029
rows.name:
That's great. Now I can call this off
before there really IS a riot![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0030
rows.name:
You're really something, you know that, Hope?
All these people came running to help you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0031
rows.name: But why? All this time, I've just been selfishly—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0032
rows.name:
Hey, everybody! They found the journal!
Go on home, now! Git! Shoo![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0033
rows.name: So Hope's problem is fixed? Whew, that's a relief![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0034
rows.name: It was killing me to see you walk around looking all sad.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0035
rows.name: If you ever need anything else, just say the word.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0036
rows.name:
I'm glad that worked out.
Mostly because I kinda sorta...hacked into FrontierNav.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0037
rows.name:
Er, you won't tell, right?
If my boss hears about this, I am sooo fired.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0038
rows.name:
You were saying something about being selfish,
but these folks all disagree.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0039
rows.name:
They need you, Hope, and so do I.
So please don't ever doubt that again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0040
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_JNK0050
rows.name: Praise

rows.label: qev092406_SEL0051
rows.name: Tell Hope that she deserves this for all her hard work.

rows.label: qev092406_JNK0060
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev092406_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Hope whether this finally allays her doubts.

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0041
rows.name: So this is what I've accomplished...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0042
rows.name: Oh, I've been such a fool.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0043
rows.name:
All this time I was looking for answers,
when they were right here in front of me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0044
rows.name: Of course it does.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0045
rows.name: How can I feel anything but blessed in the face of all this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0046
rows.name: But I do need to be stronger.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0047
rows.name:
I need to do more than be kind—
I need to really understand you all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092406_MSG0048
rows.name:
I'm far from perfect, but I hope you'll all
continue to be my friends.[ST:wait ]
